Soda
Â¶
Base class for Soda assets.
Reference documentation
This is reference documentation covering the entire Atlan model. It is
not
the best place to start when trying to understand managing Soda assets in Atlan. For that, we would suggest starting with either:
Snippets
â€” small, atomic examples of single-step use cases.
Patterns
â€” walkthroughs of common multi-step implementation patterns.

link SodaCheck "../entities/sodacheck"
Soda <|-- SodaCheck : extends
